biotools.summary: A RNA parametric structure webserver that can compute the minimum free energy structure, the partition function Z(k) over all secondary structures having exactly k hairpins, minimum free energy structure and partition function Z(k) over all secondary structures having exactly k multiloops.

bioschemas.name: RNAparametric
bioschemas.summary: A RNA parametric structure webserver that can compute the minimum free energy structure, the partition function Z(k) over all secondary structures having exactly k hairpins, minimum free energy structure and partition function Z(k) over all secondary structures having exactly k multiloops.
